metadata.title: CVE-2016-10226 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: JavaScriptCore in WebKit, as distributed in Safari Technology PreviewRelease 18, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (bitfieldout-of-bounds read and application crash) via crafted JavaScript code thatis mishandled in the operatorString function, related toassembler/MacroAssemblerARM64.h, assembler/MacroAssemblerX86Common.h, andwasm/WasmB3IRGenerator.cpp.

criterions.comment: qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
